messages.subject: Alternative Therapies for Children
messages.msgSnippet: Here is some info that may be of interest to some of you - I thought I would pass it on: This is a conference on alternative therapies for children in
messages.messageBody:
Here is some info that may be of interest to some of you - I thought I would pass it on:

This is a conference on alternative therapies for children in Massachusettes. It is being organized by a fellow homeschooling father whose son was born a year ago with microocephaly.( I am not sure of the proper spelling). He has been researching alternatives to, or in addition to, modern medicine for children and has found a wealth of information and doctors that were willing to speak and inform parents of other alternatives.

Here is the link for information about the conference - if it is of interest.

Alternative Therapies for Special Kids
Conference and Workshops, 2002
http://www.4healthykids.org/

Heather Woodward


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
